ygData.subject: Cazic Thule Gnomes
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a tinkerer on Cazic Thule with a skill lvl of 103. I would like to suggest that we fix prices on Cazic Thule for items.  The only other gnome tinkerer I
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a tinkerer on Cazic Thule with a skill lvl of 103. I would like to
suggest that we fix prices on Cazic Thule for items. The only other gnome
tinkerer I have seen on Cazic is Gnomos and he's obviously bored with too
much money as the amount he sells things for I could never compete with. I
would like get back a little of the money i've put into this skill ;-)

May I suggest
70pp for spyglasses
650pp for Auqalungs
2000pp for rebreathers (not sure on this as I am not at this lvl)

And if you see gnomos (well he'll actually approach you telling you you're
selling them for too much and giving tinkerers a bad name. Tell him that
this was the price agreed by the tinkerers of Cazic.

If anyone does disagree with these prices please reply with your ideas :)

Tzia
Tinkerer Of Cazic
